about_the_game:
The ancient Asian empires are lands of adventure, mystery, and peaceful reflection. Set the stage for your players to visit hidden temples, idyllic villages, tense battlefields and more with these eight tracks of evocative background music!

When your players travel the ancient Asian empires, set the mood for enlightenment and action with these eight evocative tracks of background music! Whether meditating at a long lost temple before setting out on the path of lost souls or fighting fiercely against skilled swordsmen, you'll find the right music here to draw your players into the experience.

This pack contains:
  • 8 BGM tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, and towns!
  • .ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects.
  • BONUS: 2 feudal battlers created by Michael Rookard

* Updated Aug 17 2022 with remastered and longer songs, previous owners will find it automatically downloads to their steam library

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
